post:
Due to several requests we received from clients, Evolution Host has expanded its arsenal of locations to Dallas, Texas USA. For just €5 you can get a reliable server with dedicated support. The specifications of our Starter VPS package can be found below.

    1 CPU Core
    512MB DDR3 RAM
    10GB SSD Storage
    125Mb/s Port
    1TB Monthly Transfer
    Advanced DDoS Protection
    Linux Distributions
    Europe/US Locations
    €5/m or €55/year

You can view the offer here: https://evolution-host.com/ssd-vps-hosting.php

Let us know if you have any queries regarding this offer and have a great day!
